title: Disney QUIZney
overview: Disney QUIZney is a live, 10-minute hosted trivia game show in the DisneyNOW app. Each day, you'll have a chance to answer seven trivia questions. The top ten players who answer the seven questions correctly and the fastest will win a cash prize in digital gift card format. The game is free to play within the DisneyNOW app on mobile and tablet devices and on DisneyNOW.com.Tune in live to QUIZney on Disney Channel and play along in the DisneyNOW app on iOS, Android and Kindle devices and on DisneyNOW.com. The game is not available on tvOS, Roku, Fire TV and Android TV devices, Samsung Tizen and Chromecast. QUIZney is a live event; you must play along at 7p EDT/4p PDT for your chance to win.
